name: symgbasf1o
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c0, c2, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c0, c2, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c0, c2, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c0, c2, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c0, c2, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csymg, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c0, c2, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csymg, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 : c2 ↔ c2))
⊣ c3 =(SymGrp ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

comment: Elements in the symmetric group are 1-1 onto functions. (Contributed by SO, 9-Jul-2018.)
